casebody.data:
<casebody firstpage="440" lastpage="441" xmlns="http://nrs.harvard.edu/urn-3:HLS.Libr.US_Case_Law.Schema.Case_Body:v1">
<parties id="p-1">
  In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Richard S. HANLON.
 </parties>
<docketnumber id="p-2">
  No. D-2843.
 </docketnumber>
<court id="p-3">
  Supreme Court of the United States
 </court>
<decisiondate id="p-4">
  Nov. 2, 2015.
 </decisiondate>
<opinion id="p-5">
  Richard S. Hanlon, of Bayonne, New Jersey, is suspended from the practice of
  law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
 </opinion>

</casebody>
